name: Demon Destroy
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey in Demon Destroy, an action-packed runner game where chaos meets destruction. Dodge fiery obstacles, crush demonic enemies, and unleash your power as you navigate through apocalyptic landscapes. With fast-paced gameplay, stunning visuals, and immersive sound design, every run is a battle for survival. Perfect for fans of adrenaline-filled challenges, Demon Destroy will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to conquer the inferno?
